item.title: Function hit count using Pseudo-Register in Windbg
item.description: What if we want to know the number of times a function was invoked. We can have “.echo” or “.printf” on break-point of a function and count the output manually. The better way to do this is using pseudo-registers. In my previous post I had mentioned about alias inside the debugger. The debugger also provides User defined Pseudo-Registers for scripting inside the debugger. We can use them to manipulate values within our scripts.
